name: Electric Sheep (Elliot Cox)
description:
Cover Image by Miss Hart (IG: @miss.harts.art)

The robot revolution has come. Slash your way through a horde of villainous robots and defeat their devious masters.

These robots have destroyed many lives, and your wranglers are seeking vengeance for the fallen. It's up to you to put a stop to the rampage and bring peace to humanity. This shouldn't be an issue for someone of your skill.

After all, they're just robots...right?

Fight through 3 unique levels and 4 bosses with classic hack 'n slash action.

CONTROLS:

FunctionKeyboardGamepadMovementArrow KeysD-PadAttackZXUseXAPauseEscapeStart
